Name: [Ignite] Vintage Matchbox
Desc: Dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> triggers <color=#FF5521>Blaze</color>, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> equal to 1200% of ATK. This effect can trigger once every 8s.
Desc2: Strike a match, toss it, turn around, and wait for the explosion. And there you have it, a classic movie shot.
